data.text: @Reuters @Breakingviews @petesweeneypro So why do you hate us and love Russia.

@Reuters @Breakingviews @petesweeneypro Other than Vietnam there has been provocation before U.S goes to war. What was Ukraines provocation to Russia. China was built by USA. Without us you would still be a 3rd world country.
@Reuters @Breakingviews @petesweeneypro How about you just shut up https://t.co/8swWmhPbMT
